26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_engine_disp_dport.c,v 1.3 2018/08/27 07:43:38 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "dport.h"
30#include "outpdp.h"
31#include "nv50.h"
32
33#include <subdev/bios.h>
34#include <subdev/bios/init.h>
35#include <subdev/i2c.h>
36
37#include <nvif/class.h>
38
39/******************************************************************************
40 * link training
41 *****************************************************************************/
42struct dp_state {
43 struct nvkm_output_dp *outp;
44 int link_nr;
45 u32 link_bw;
46 u8 stat[6];
47 u8 conf[4];
48 bool pc2;
49 u8 pc2stat;
50 u8 pc2conf[2];
51};
52
53static int
54dp_set_link_config(struct dp_state *dp)
55{
56 struct nvkm_output_dp *outp = dp->outp;
57 struct nvkm_disp *disp = outp->base.disp;
58 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &disp->engine.subdev;
59 struct nvkm_bios *bios = subdev->device->bios;
60 struct nvbios_init init = {
61 .subdev = subdev,
62 .bios = bios,
63 .offset = 0x0000,
64 .outp = &outp->base.info,
65 .crtc = -1,
66 .execute = 1,
67 };
68 u32 lnkcmp;
69 u8 sink[2];
70 int ret;
71
72 OUTP_DBG(&outp->base, "%d lanes at %d KB/s", dp->link_nr, dp->link_bw);
73
74 /* set desired link configuration on the source */
75 if ((lnkcmp = dp->outp->info.lnkcmp)) {
76 if (outp->version < 0x30) {
77 while ((dp->link_bw / 10) < nvbios_rd16(bios, lnkcmp))
78 lnkcmp += 4;
79 init.offset = nvbios_rd16(bios, lnkcmp + 2);
80 } else {
81 while ((dp->link_bw / 27000) < nvbios_rd08(bios, lnkcmp))
82 lnkcmp += 3;
83 init.offset = nvbios_rd16(bios, lnkcmp + 1);
84 }
85
86 nvbios_exec(&init);
87 }
88
89 ret = outp->func->lnk_ctl(outp, dp->link_nr, dp->link_bw / 27000,
90 outp->dpcd[DPCD_RC02] &
91 DPCD_RC02_ENHANCED_FRAME_CAP);
92 if (ret) {
93 if (ret < 0)
94 OUTP_ERR(&outp->base, "lnk_ctl failed with %d", ret);
95 return ret;
96 }
97
98 outp->func->lnk_pwr(outp, dp->link_nr);
99
100 /* set desired link configuration on the sink */
101 sink[0] = dp->link_bw / 27000;
102 sink[1] = dp->link_nr;
103 if (outp->dpcd[DPCD_RC02] & DPCD_RC02_ENHANCED_FRAME_CAP)
104 sink[1] |= DPCD_LC01_ENHANCED_FRAME_EN;
105
106 return nvkm_wraux(outp->aux, DPCD_LC00_LINK_BW_SET, sink, 2);
107}
108
109static void
110dp_set_training_pattern(struct dp_state *dp, u8 pattern)
111{
112 struct nvkm_output_dp *outp = dp->outp;
113 u8 sink_tp;
114
115 OUTP_DBG(&outp->base, "training pattern %d", pattern);
116 outp->func->pattern(outp, pattern);
117
118 nvkm_rdaux(outp->aux, DPCD_LC02, &sink_tp, 1);
119 sink_tp &= ~DPCD_LC02_TRAINING_PATTERN_SET;
120 sink_tp |= pattern;
121 nvkm_wraux(outp->aux, DPCD_LC02, &sink_tp, 1);
122}
123
124static int
125dp_link_train_commit(struct dp_state *dp, bool pc)
126{
127 struct nvkm_output_dp *outp = dp->outp;
128 int ret, i;
129
130 for (i = 0; i < dp->link_nr; i++) {
131 u8 lane = (dp->stat[4 + (i >> 1)] >> ((i & 1) * 4)) & 0xf;
132 u8 lpc2 = (dp->pc2stat >> (i * 2)) & 0x3;
133 u8 lpre = (lane & 0x0c) >> 2;
134 u8 lvsw = (lane & 0x03) >> 0;
135 u8 hivs = 3 - lpre;
136 u8 hipe = 3;
137 u8 hipc = 3;
138
139 if (lpc2 >= hipc)
140 lpc2 = hipc | DPCD_LC0F_LANE0_MAX_POST_CURSOR2_REACHED;
141 if (lpre >= hipe) {
142 lpre = hipe | DPCD_LC03_MAX_SWING_REACHED; /* yes. */
143 lvsw = hivs = 3 - (lpre & 3);
144 } else
145 if (lvsw >= hivs) {
146 lvsw = hivs | DPCD_LC03_MAX_SWING_REACHED;
147 }
148
149 dp->conf[i] = (lpre << 3) | lvsw;
150 dp->pc2conf[i >> 1] |= lpc2 << ((i & 1) * 4);
151
152 OUTP_DBG(&outp->base, "config lane %d %02x %02x",
153 i, dp->conf[i], lpc2);
154 outp->func->drv_ctl(outp, i, lvsw & 3, lpre & 3, lpc2 & 3);
155 }
156
157 ret = nvkm_wraux(outp->aux, DPCD_LC03(0), dp->conf, 4);
158 if (ret)
159 return ret;
160
161 if (pc) {
162 ret = nvkm_wraux(outp->aux, DPCD_LC0F, dp->pc2conf, 2);
163 if (ret)
164 return ret;
165 }
166
167 return 0;
168}
169
170static int
171dp_link_train_update(struct dp_state *dp, bool pc, u32 delay)
172{
173 struct nvkm_output_dp *outp = dp->outp;
174 int ret;
175
176 if (outp->dpcd[DPCD_RC0E_AUX_RD_INTERVAL])
177 mdelay(outp->dpcd[DPCD_RC0E_AUX_RD_INTERVAL] * 4);
178 else
179 udelay(delay);
180
181 ret = nvkm_rdaux(outp->aux, DPCD_LS02, dp->stat, 6);
182 if (ret)
183 return ret;
184
185 if (pc) {
186 ret = nvkm_rdaux(outp->aux, DPCD_LS0C, &dp->pc2stat, 1);
187 if (ret)
188 dp->pc2stat = 0x00;
189 OUTP_DBG(&outp->base, "status %6ph pc2 %02x",
190 dp->stat, dp->pc2stat);
191 } else {
192 OUTP_DBG(&outp->base, "status %6ph", dp->stat);
193 }
194
195 return 0;
196}
197
198static int
199dp_link_train_cr(struct dp_state *dp)
200{
201 bool cr_done = false, abort = false;
202 int voltage = dp->conf[0] & DPCD_LC03_VOLTAGE_SWING_SET;
203 int tries = 0, i;
204
205 dp_set_training_pattern(dp, 1);
206
207 do {
208 if (dp_link_train_commit(dp, false) ||
209 dp_link_train_update(dp, false, 100))
210 break;
211
212 cr_done = true;
213 for (i = 0; i < dp->link_nr; i++) {
214 u8 lane = (dp->stat[i >> 1] >> ((i & 1) * 4)) & 0xf;
215 if (!(lane & DPCD_LS02_LANE0_CR_DONE)) {
216 cr_done = false;
217 if (dp->conf[i] & DPCD_LC03_MAX_SWING_REACHED)
218 abort = true;
219 break;
220 }
221 }
222
223 if ((dp->conf[0] & DPCD_LC03_VOLTAGE_SWING_SET) != voltage) {
224 voltage = dp->conf[0] & DPCD_LC03_VOLTAGE_SWING_SET;
225 tries = 0;
226 }
227 } while (!cr_done && !abort && ++tries < 5);
228
229 return cr_done ? 0 : -1;
230}
231
232static int
233dp_link_train_eq(struct dp_state *dp)
234{
235 struct nvkm_output_dp *outp = dp->outp;
236 bool eq_done = false, cr_done = true;
237 int tries = 0, i;
238
239 if (outp->dpcd[2] & DPCD_RC02_TPS3_SUPPORTED)
240 dp_set_training_pattern(dp, 3);
241 else
242 dp_set_training_pattern(dp, 2);
243
244 do {
245 if ((tries &&
246 dp_link_train_commit(dp, dp->pc2)) ||
247 dp_link_train_update(dp, dp->pc2, 400))
248 break;
249
250 eq_done = !!(dp->stat[2] & DPCD_LS04_INTERLANE_ALIGN_DONE);
251 for (i = 0; i < dp->link_nr && eq_done; i++) {
252 u8 lane = (dp->stat[i >> 1] >> ((i & 1) * 4)) & 0xf;
253 if (!(lane & DPCD_LS02_LANE0_CR_DONE))
254 cr_done = false;
255 if (!(lane & DPCD_LS02_LANE0_CHANNEL_EQ_DONE) ||
256 !(lane & DPCD_LS02_LANE0_SYMBOL_LOCKED))
257 eq_done = false;
258 }
259 } while (!eq_done && cr_done && ++tries <= 5);
260
261 return eq_done ? 0 : -1;
262}
263
264static void
265dp_link_train_init(struct dp_state *dp, bool spread)
266{
267 struct nvkm_output_dp *outp = dp->outp;
268 struct nvkm_disp *disp = outp->base.disp;
269 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &disp->engine.subdev;
270 struct nvbios_init init = {
271 .subdev = subdev,
272 .bios = subdev->device->bios,
273 .outp = &outp->base.info,
274 .crtc = -1,
275 .execute = 1,
276 };
277
278 /* set desired spread */
279 if (spread)
280 init.offset = outp->info.script[2];
281 else
282 init.offset = outp->info.script[3];
283 nvbios_exec(&init);
284
285 /* pre-train script */
286 init.offset = outp->info.script[0];
287 nvbios_exec(&init);
288}
289
290static void
291dp_link_train_fini(struct dp_state *dp)
292{
293 struct nvkm_output_dp *outp = dp->outp;
294 struct nvkm_disp *disp = outp->base.disp;
295 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &disp->engine.subdev;
296 struct nvbios_init init = {
297 .subdev = subdev,
298 .bios = subdev->device->bios,
299 .outp = &outp->base.info,
300 .crtc = -1,
301 .execute = 1,
302 };
303
304 /* post-train script */
305 init.offset = outp->info.script[1];
306 nvbios_exec(&init);
307}
308
309static const struct dp_rates {
310 u32 rate;
311 u8 bw;
312 u8 nr;
313} nvkm_dp_rates[] = {
314 { 2160000, 0x14, 4 },
315 { 1080000, 0x0a, 4 },
316 { 1080000, 0x14, 2 },
317 { 648000, 0x06, 4 },
318 { 540000, 0x0a, 2 },
319 { 540000, 0x14, 1 },
320 { 324000, 0x06, 2 },
321 { 270000, 0x0a, 1 },
322 { 162000, 0x06, 1 },
323 {}
324};
325
326void
327nvkm_dp_train(struct work_struct *w)
328{
329 struct nvkm_output_dp *outp = container_of(w, typeof(*outp), lt.work);
330 struct nv50_disp *disp = nv50_disp(outp->base.disp);
331 const struct dp_rates *cfg = nvkm_dp_rates;
332 struct dp_state _dp = {
333 .outp = outp,
334 }, *dp = &_dp;
335 u32 datarate = 0;
336 u8 pwr;
337 int ret;
338
339 if (!outp->base.info.location && disp->func->sor.magic)
340 disp->func->sor.magic(&outp->base);
341
342 /* bring capabilities within encoder limits */
343 if (disp->base.engine.subdev.device->chipset < 0xd0)
344 outp->dpcd[2] &= ~DPCD_RC02_TPS3_SUPPORTED;
345 if ((outp->dpcd[2] & 0x1f) > outp->base.info.dpconf.link_nr) {
346 outp->dpcd[2] &= ~DPCD_RC02_MAX_LANE_COUNT;
347 outp->dpcd[2] |= outp->base.info.dpconf.link_nr;
348 }
349 if (outp->dpcd[1] > outp->base.info.dpconf.link_bw)
350 outp->dpcd[1] = outp->base.info.dpconf.link_bw;
351 dp->pc2 = outp->dpcd[2] & DPCD_RC02_TPS3_SUPPORTED;
352
353 /* restrict link config to the lowest required rate, if requested */
354 if (datarate) {
355 datarate = (datarate / 8) * 10; /* 8B/10B coding overhead */
356 while (cfg[1].rate >= datarate)
357 cfg++;
358 }
359 cfg--;
360
361 /* disable link interrupt handling during link training */
362 nvkm_notify_put(&outp->irq);
363
364 /* ensure sink is not in a low-power state */
365 if (!nvkm_rdaux(outp->aux, DPCD_SC00, &pwr, 1)) {
366 if ((pwr & DPCD_SC00_SET_POWER) != DPCD_SC00_SET_POWER_D0) {
367 pwr &= ~DPCD_SC00_SET_POWER;
368 pwr |= DPCD_SC00_SET_POWER_D0;
369 nvkm_wraux(outp->aux, DPCD_SC00, &pwr, 1);
370 }
371 }
372
373 /* enable down-spreading and execute pre-train script from vbios */
374 dp_link_train_init(dp, outp->dpcd[3] & 0x01);
375
376 while (ret = -EIO, (++cfg)->rate) {
377 /* select next configuration supported by encoder and sink */
378 while (cfg->nr > (outp->dpcd[2] & DPCD_RC02_MAX_LANE_COUNT) ||
379 cfg->bw > (outp->dpcd[DPCD_RC01_MAX_LINK_RATE]))
380 cfg++;
381 dp->link_bw = cfg->bw * 27000;
382 dp->link_nr = cfg->nr;
383
384 /* program selected link configuration */
385 ret = dp_set_link_config(dp);
386 if (ret == 0) {
387 /* attempt to train the link at this configuration */
388 memset(dp->stat, 0x00, sizeof(dp->stat));
389 if (!dp_link_train_cr(dp) &&
390 !dp_link_train_eq(dp))
391 break;
392 } else
393 if (ret) {
394 /* dp_set_link_config() handled training, or
395 * we failed to communicate with the sink.
396 */
397 break;
398 }
399 }
400
401 /* finish link training and execute post-train script from vbios */
402 dp_set_training_pattern(dp, 0);
403 if (ret < 0)
404 OUTP_ERR(&outp->base, "link training failed");
405
406 dp_link_train_fini(dp);
407
408 /* signal completion and enable link interrupt handling */
409 OUTP_DBG(&outp->base, "training complete");
410#ifdef __NetBSD__
411 spin_lock(&outp->lt.lock);
412 atomic_set(&outp->lt.done, 1);
413 DRM_SPIN_WAKEUP_ONE(&outp->lt.wait, &outp->lt.lock);
414 spin_unlock(&outp->lt.lock);
415#else
416 atomic_set(&outp->lt.done, 1);
417 wake_up(&outp->lt.wait);
418#endif
419 nvkm_notify_get(&outp->irq);
420}
